text: The 1922 North Carolina Tar Heels football team represented the University of North Carolina in the 1922 college football season. Led by second year head coaches Bob Fetzer and Bill Fetzer, the team compiled a record of 9-1 and tied for the Southern Conference (SoCon) championship. The team's quarterback was Monk McDonald. ==Schedule== ==References== * North Carolina Tar Heels Category:North Carolina Tar Heels football seasons Tar Heels
title: 1922 North Carolina Tar Heels football team
